name: Illuminated
description:
DESCRIPTIONS

Look for the light. 

Follow the light. 

Enjoy it. 

And you will eventually complete the journey. 

This is an optical illusion game as well as a puzzle game. Solve the puzzle and look for the light ahead of you.

INSTRUCTIONS  | CONTROL

   Q to quit.

    S to start.

    R to replay the game.

    → Go right.

    ← Go left.

    ↑ Go forward.

    ↓ Go backward.
